title: Myra
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, Nick Bosustow and Bosustow Entertainment
brief_description: When Myra goes to dancing class she leaps, sways and kicks, just as Mrs Page tells her to. But her enthusiasm and imagination go far beyond Mrs Page. From the book “Myra” written by Barbara Bottner.
creator_credit_for_label: Sam Weiss, Nick Bosustow and Bosustow Entertainment
